recipe.title: Stuffing
note: This originates from Grammy Alyce Liptock
instructions: Cut up bread into cubes & leave exposed for a day or two to get dry.
Mix with salt & pepper, sage, 1 small chopped onion, 2 beaten eggs & some melted butter – about 1/2 - 1 c. depending on amount of bread?
Put in a pan and bake at 350° for 30 mins.
